txt.en: 'A Gond Orchal war-monger is corrupting the tombs in this area. Defeat the risen Wights and the gaunt-lord at the top of the hill.'
Return to Baglan and tell him you have defeated the evil
With your mission in Gond Orchal successful, you should return to the mission giver.
Mission: The Tombs of Gond Orchal
'You have done well [placeholder]. As agreed, you are deserving of payment. Take this and know that we are grateful for all you have done.'
Speak with the mission giver to travel to the tomb. Defeat Wights and the Gond Orchal war-monger.
There is no twist in this mission.
Complete the Mission: The Tombs of Gond Orchal
Gond Orchal has been corrupted by a gaunt-lord who is raising Wights from the various tombs. This evil must be defeated.
'Be careful amongst the tombs at Gond Orchal, [placeholder]. There are Wights about and a gaunt-lord oversees the area from the top of the hill.'
